Title: Establishes an energy project revolving loan program and fund
Summary: Establishes an energy project revolving loan program and energy project revolving loan fund to encourage the development of renewable energy generating projects by awarding financial assistance for certain zero-emission energy generation projects.
LawCode: Add ยง1018, Pub Auth L; add ยง99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing an energy project revolving loan program and energy project revolving loan fund
